text: I have an embedded, HS link CTA that occasionally turns into a little graphic instead of the live text version. I can’t find any patterns as to why it shows up as this little graphic in random browsers, on random machines, every so often. Has anyone run into this before? It’s supposed to be a full-width, live-text cta with a background image. Turning off JS doesn’t affect anything. In the attached screens, A is how it is supposed to (usally) looks, and B is the little graphic that is getting served up sometimes.
Have you checked to make sure it isn’t setup as a “smart” button or a multivariate test?
It may be the case that your button is setup to change design based some some rules.
I’ll take a look. Thank you.
